wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Slice

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
        • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Slice

  • public class HEM_Slice
extends HEM_Modifier
    Planar cut of a mesh. Faces on positive side of cut plane are removed.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
